title: Android Pie Phones: When will your mobile get the update?
description: ![AndroidPie]()Sony’s new flagship, the recently released [Sony XperiaXZ3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz3) runs Android Pieout of the box. However, the company has also started rolling out the Android9 Pie update to users of the [Sony XperiaXZ2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz2) and [Sony XperiaXZ2 Compact](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz2-compact)…far earlier than expected.Sony had initially said the the handsets would get the Pie update in November,but the update started appearing as early as October 12.What’s more, in a [blogpost](https://blogs.sonymobile.com/2018/10/18/android-9-pie-update-on-more-xperia-devices/), the company has said that more early updates are coming, andthe rest of the handsets earmarked for Android Pie are “bang on schedule.”The following handsets started getting the update on October 26:  * [Sony Xperia XZ Premium](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz-premium)  * [Sony Xperia XZ1](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz1)  * [Sony Xperia XZ1 Compact](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xz1-compact)The [Sony Xperia XZ2 Premium](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/sony-xperia-xz2-premium-uk-release-3533344), meanwhile, will be treated to the Android Pieupdate on November 7.And finally, the models listed below, will be bumped up from March 4, 2019:  * [Sony Xperia XA2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xperia-xa2)  * [Sony XA2 Ultra](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-xa2-ultra)  * Sony Xperia XA2 PlusSony has also published a detailed infographic explaining why it can take solong for Android version updates to reach non-Google phones, which you canfind [here](https://blogs.sonymobile.com/2018/08/16/can-update-xperia-android-pie/#gref). You can read a breakdown of the process[here](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/android-update-delays-sony-3535556).**Have you tried out Android Pie for yourself yet? Share your earlyimpressions with us on Twitter @TrustedReviews.**
